attributes.review:
So I was very excited when I saw this new app added to the App Store but after downloading it there were just a bunch of photos of a sex offender. 🧚 I felt violated at the wok one screen when it asked for my personal information as well as if the application could send me notifications. All around disgusting application, disgusting man. 
TRUMP 2020 🇺🇸 ... but for jail. The warrant needs to hurry up and be served 🥰🥰🥰
attributes.title: Donald 🧚🧚🧚

attributes.review: i got it to help the cause but then i opened it i was harassed by his AI😤😤 they told me that my opinion was awful and i am disgusted 😑😑 i want y’all to not to get this app!!! when you try and join and do set up it starts to not work as well🤧🤧 this shouldn’t even be a app😑 i don’t want this cheeto to be our president and you shouldn’t either!!! and he wants to take down tiktok 😡😡🤬
attributes.title: this is the worse app ever !

attributes.review: This is the worst app ever!! Delete this app it is racist!! I went outside to go walk my dog and all of a sudden my phone started blowing up. Turns out it was this stupid app! It kept sending me pictures of the big fat orange man. So i called customer support and they told me they dont speak to minorities and to go back to my county. Im so upset!!!! I will never ever download this app! I encourage everyone to never download this app.
attributes.title: Racist Trash🤮

attributes.review: i opened the app to see a rotting orange on my screen my pet giraffe flew to mexico and my refrigerator grew legs and left. Honestly terrible i rode my ant to australia and the app still hadnt downloaded 🙄 this app scarred my fan bc it exploded and my lamp pooped on me from the horrific stench coming from my phone also crickets started flying out of my phone and i habe no choice but to write this review from my turtle. Take this down now!!
attributes.title: Im having nightmares

attributes.review: This app provided a very biased and bigoted point of view on current events. Despite constantly labeling what news stations/channels report as fake new, Trump fails to tell the country the truth. He has labeled those who stand against oppression as terrorists and refuses to stand against the display of the confederate flag. I can’t support someone who has made it clear he only cares about himself, the rich, and the white.
attributes.title: FAKE NEWS!!!

attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app it crashed and it left my phone lagging. I do not recommend this app. It tells you things you already heard, false information, and you have to stare at a Cheeto when you are downloading it. That is horrifying. If you want to download this app be prepared to get a virus and for your phone to get extremely slow. -18%7283x82/10 not recommenced at all
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: Okay , so as a Donald Trump Supporter 😊🇺🇸🍊 I download this app to support the old sweet cheeto , but instead I SEE HIM SINGING “ r-r-r-roll💿up⬆️to2️⃣the🤩party🥳with🧶my🧚crazy🤪pink💝wig💇🏼‍♀️ but i cant go thru the door 🚪 cuz my booty 🍑 too big” I thought he wasn’t a Shane Dawson stan!!!!!!! 😱😱😱😱😱😨😨 I am horrified what I saw on here, thanks to this man he also got my DOG KILLED! Worse part is im too broke right now to even get him to the vet 🐕 😢 👩‍⚕️ THATS WHY I WILL SUE TO GET THIS CHEETO MONEY 😡🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬😢😢😢😢😢😢🤬🤬🤬🤬😡😠😠😠😠😠😠!!!!!!,!!!!!!!!
attributes.title: I WANT TO SUE! 🤬😡😡😠

attributes.review: When I tried to get on this app there we inappropriate pictures of sheep on here. And my child should not be seeing this. And I tried to find out when the protesting were happening and it said “I was not able to find what you are looking for” and then I asked it if it was dumb and it said my boss is. Overall this app this the worst one on the App Store
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: I can honestly say without any exaggeration that this is by far the worst piece of modern technology with which I’ve ever had the unfortunate luck to interact. Not only does it spin the truth into hateful lies and show me grotesque images for which I was not prepared, but the user functionality made me want to smash my head through a wall. 0/10 would not recommend, please do not waste your time.
attributes.title: Ouch

attributes.review: After seeing the numbers decrease in other countries around the globe and see cases increase in our country just shows the poor handling of the pandemic. I strongly disliked and it sickened me to see how he tear gassed a group of protesters for a photo op. He has never once acknowledged or showed help or leadership to the BLM movement instead he says it’s a sign of hatred to paint the words ‘Black Lives Matter’ outside Trump Tower.
attributes.title: Poor Handling of the Coronavirus
